<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H4391|מְלָא]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא‎</span><sub>249</sub> **verb** ==be full, fill== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (Pi\`el transitive); Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מלא‎</span> (Pi\`el transitive) [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. 60</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***malû***</u></abbr> (transitive and intransitive) [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 409</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (transitive) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (intransitive); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (transitive and intransitive); Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (transitive), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלָא‎</span> (intransitive and transitive), Palmyrene proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מלא‎</span> = ***plenitude***, [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>Palm 7, 2</sup> and others; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מלא‎</span> [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>14</sup> [[BDB#Levy|Levy-Os]]<sup>ZMG xix.1863, 211 f.</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxix.1875, 595</sup>); — 

**Qal**<sub>99</sub> ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Exod.40.34|Exod 40:34]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלַאוֺ‎</span> [[Esth.7.5|Esth 7:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵאתָ‎</span> [[Job.36.17|Job 36:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵאתִי‎</span> [[Mic.3.8|Mic 3:8]]; [[Jer.6.11|Jer 6:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵ֫תִי‎</span> [[Job.32.18|Job 32:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָֽלְאוּ‎</span> [[Gen.29.21|Gen 29:21]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.28.16|Ezek 28:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵאתָ‎</span>) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Co|Co]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Isa.1.15|Isa 1:15]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִמְלָאֵ֣מוֺ‎</span> [[Exod.15.9|Exod 15:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְלְאוּ‎</span> [[Gen.50.3|Gen 50:3]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְלְאוּ‎</span> [[Gen.25.24|Gen 25:24]]; [[Gen.50.3|Gen 50:3]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְאוּ‎</span> [[Gen.1.22|Gen 1:22]] + 5 t.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹאת‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹאות‎</span>) [[Lev.8.33|Lev 8:33]] + 12 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא‎</span> [[Jer.23.24|Jer 23:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֵאִים‎</span> [[Isa.6.1|Isa 6:1]] (compare also below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא‎</span> ***adjective ***); — 

**1.** ***be full***, usually with accusative material: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** literally ==subject houses== [[Exod.8.17|Exod 8:17]]; [[Exod.10.6|Exod 10:6]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]) [[Judg.16.27|Judg 16:27]]; [[Isa.13.21|Isa 13:21]]; [[2Chr.5.13|2Chr 5:13]], compare [[Ezek.10.4|Ezek 10:4]] (strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]]); winepress [[Joel.4.13|Joel 4:13]] threshing-floor [[Joel.2.24|Joel 2:24]] vessel [[2Kgs.4.6|2Kgs 4:6]]; [[Job.21.24|Job 21:24]], etc.; [[Job.20.22|Job 20:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹאות‎</span> (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹא‎</span>), i.e. ***fulness, abundance***. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** figurative, earth full of violence [[Gen.6.13|Gen 6:13]], compare [[Lev.19.29|Lev 19:29]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Mic.6.12|Mic 6:12]]; [[Isa.1.15|Isa 1:15]]; [[Jer.23.10|Jer 23:10]]; [[Jer.51.5|Jer 51:5]]; [[Ps.26.10|Ps 26:10]]; [[Ezek.7.23|Ezek 7:23]] (twice in verse); [[Eccl.9.3|Eccl 9:3]], etc.; earth full of glory, mercy, goodness, knowledge, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ps.33.5|Ps 33:5]]; [[Ps.119.64|Ps 119:64]]; [[Isa.11.9|Isa 11:9]]; [[Hab.3.3|Hab 3:3]] compare also [[Ps.48.11|Ps 48:11]]; [[Ps.104.24|Ps 104:24]], etc.; subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> = desire be satisfied (full) with suffix [[Exod.15.9|Exod 15:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְדִין רָשָׁע מ‎</span> [[Job.36.17|Job 36:17]] ***and of judgment on the wicked art thou full*** (hast thou thy fill), compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא לֵב לַעֲשׂוֺת רָ֑ע‎</span> [[Eccl.8.11|Eccl 8:11]] especially of days, years, ***be full, accomplished, ended***, [[Gen.25.24|Gen 25:24]]; [[Gen.29.21|Gen 29:21]]; [[Gen.50.3|Gen 50:3]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); [[Lev.8.33|Lev 8:33]]; [[Lev.12.4|Lev 12:4]]; [[Lev.12.6|Lev 12:6]]; [[Lev.25.30|Lev 25:30]]; [[Num.6.5|Num 6:5]]; [[Num.6.13|Num 6:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); [[1Sam.18.26|1Sam 18:26]]; [[2Sam.7.12|2Sam 7:12]]; [[Jer.25.12|Jer 25:12]]; [[Jer.29.10|Jer 29:10]]; [[Lam.4.18|Lam 4:18]]; [[Ezek.5.2|Ezek 5:2]]; [[1Chr.17.11|1Chr 17:11]]; [[Esth.1.5|Esth 1:5]]; [[Esth.2.12|Esth 2:12]]; [[Dan.10.3|Dan 10:3]] compare also with other subject (literally) [[Jer.25.34|Jer 25:34]]; [[Isa.40.2|Isa 40:2]]. 

**2.** transitive ***fill***, of populating sea and earth [[Gen.1.22|Gen 1:22]]; [[Gen.1.28|Gen 1:28]]; [[Gen.9.1|Gen 9:1]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); ***consecrate*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְאוּ יֶדְכֶם ליהוה‎</span>; (literally fill the hand) [[Exod.32.29|Exod 32:29]] (compare below); especially of glory of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> filling tabernacle and temple; [[Exod.40.34|Exod 40:34]]; [[Exod.40.35|Exod 40:35]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[1Kgs.8.10|1Kgs 8:10]]; [[1Kgs.8.11|1Kgs 8:11]], compare [[Isa.6.1|Isa 6:1]] see also [[Jer.23.24|Jer 23:24]], especially literal [[Ezek.10.3|Ezek 10:3]]; [[Ezek.43.5|Ezek 43:5]]; [[Ezek.44.4|Ezek 44:4]]; [[2Chr.5.14|2Chr 5:14]]; [[2Chr.7.1|2Chr 7:1]]; [[2Chr.7.2|2Chr 7:2]] followed by 2 accusative***fill*** jars (with) water [[1Kgs.18.34|1Kgs 18:34]] absolute ***overflow*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכָּֿלגְּֿדוֺתָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Josh.3.15|Josh 3:15]] (compare [[1Chr.12.16|1Chr 12:16]] **Pi\`el**); ==figurative== ***fill*** land with sin [[Jer.16.18|Jer 16:18]], compare [[Jer.19.4|Jer 19:4]]; [[Ezek.8.17|Ezek 8:17]]; [[Ezek.28.16|Ezek 28:16]], compare [[Ezek.30.11|Ezek 30:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלָאוֺ לִבּוֺ לַעֲשׂוֺתכֵּֿן‎</span> [[Esth.7.5|Esth 7:5]] (compare [[Eccl.8.11|Eccl 8:11]] above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְאוּ הַשְּׁלָטִים‎</span> [[Jer.51.11|Jer 51:11]] meaning obscure, see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁלֶט‎</span>]; [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְטוּ הַשּׁ‎</span> ***polish***. Niph\`al ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְלָאֿ‎</span> [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּלֵא‎</span> [[2Sam.23.7|2Sam 23:7]] + 9 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמָּלֵא‎</span> [[Exod.7.25|Exod 7:25]] + 5 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּֽלְא֫וּ‎</span> [[Prov.3.10|Prov 3:10]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּֽלֵ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Prov.24.4|Prov 24:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּֽלְאוּן‎</span> [[Ezek.32.6|Ezek 32:6]] — 

**1.** ***be filled***, usually with accusative of material (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source [[Eccl.1.8|Eccl 1:8]], compare [[Ezek.32.6|Ezek 32:6]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Hab.2.14|Hab 2:14]]); land, with people [[Exod.1.7|Exod 1:7]] compare [[2Kgs.3.17|2Kgs 3:17]]; [[2Kgs.3.20|2Kgs 3:20]]; [[Isa.2.7|Isa 2:7]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.2.8|Isa 2:8]] house with smoke [[Isa.6.4|Isa 6:4]], compare [[Ezek.10.4|Ezek 10:4]] see also [[Prov.3.10|Prov 3:10]]; [[Prov.24.4|Prov 24:4]]; [[Jer.13.12|Jer 13:12]] (twice in verse); [[Zech.8.5|Zech 8:5]]; [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]]; [[Eccl.11.3|Eccl 11:3]]; [[2Kgs.10.21|2Kgs 10:21]]; [[Ezek.32.6|Ezek 32:6]] = ***be armed*** [[2Sam.23.7|2Sam 23:7]] (literally ***be filled*** or ***fill himself***, i.e. his hand, with weapon, compare **Pi\`el 2**); ***be satisfied***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> = appetite [[Eccl.6.7|Eccl 6:7]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹזֶן‎</span> [[Eccl.1.8|Eccl 1:8]] figurative earth filled with violence (compare **Qal**) [[Gen.6.11|Gen 6:11]], compare [[Ezek.9.9|Ezek 9:9]]; [[Ezek.23.33|Ezek 23:33]] with glory and knowledge of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Num.14.21|Num 14:21]]; [[Hab.2.14|Hab 2:14]]; [[Ps.72.19|Ps 72:19]] see also [[1Kgs.7.14|1Kgs 7:14]]; [[Ps.71.8|Ps 71:8]]; [[Ps.126.2|Ps 126:2]]; [[Esth.3.5|Esth 3:5]]; [[Esth.5.9|Esth 5:9]]; [[Prov.20.17|Prov 20:17]] absolute [[Ezek.26.2|Ezek 26:2]] (but [[BDB#Co|Co]] below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא‎</span> ***adjective ***, so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]) [[Ezek.27.25|Ezek 27:25]]. 

**2.** ***be accomplished, ended***, subject days [[Exod.7.25|Exod 7:25]] of an exchange, requital, [[Job.15.32|Job 15:32]]. **Pi\`el**<sub>112</sub> ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּא‎</span> [[Exod.35.35|Exod 35:35]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלָּא‎</span> [[Jer.51.34|Jer 51:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּאתָ‎</span> [[Deut.6.11|Deut 6:11]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְאוּ‎</span> [[Num.32.11|Num 32:11]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַלֵּא‎</span> [[Lev.8.33|Lev 8:33]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַלֵּה֗֗֗‎</span> [[Job.8.21|Job 8:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמַלְאוּ‎</span> [[Gen.42.25|Gen 42:25]]; [[Exod.39.10|Exod 39:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַלֵּ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.7.19|Ezek 7:19]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלֵּא‎</span> [[Gen.29.27|Gen 29:27]] + 5 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְאוּ‎</span> [[Jer.4.5|Jer 4:5]]; [[Ezek.9.7|Ezek 9:7]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלֵּא‎</span> [[Exod.29.29|Exod 29:29]] + 5 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְּאוֺת‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹת‎</span>-) [[Exod.31.5|Exod 31:5]] + 5 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְּאָם‎</span> [[Jer.33.5|Jer 33:5]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַלֵּא‎</span> [[Jer.13.13|Jer 13:13]]; [[1Chr.12.15|1Chr 12:15]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַלְאִים‎</span> [[Isa.65.11|Isa 65:11]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***fill*** (often with 2 accusative; literal, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.24|2Kgs 9:24]]; [[Ezra.9.11|Ezra 9:11]]; [[Job.40.31|Job 40:31]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Jer.51.34|Jer 51:34]]; [[Ps.127.5|Ps 127:5]]): [[Gen.21.19|Gen 21:19]]; [[Gen.24.16|Gen 24:16]]; [[Gen.26.15|Gen 26:15]]; [[Gen.42.25|Gen 42:25]]; [[Gen.44.1|Gen 44:1]]; [[Exod.2.16|Exod 2:16]]; [[Deut.6.11|Deut 6:11]]; [[Josh.9.13|Josh 9:13]]; [[1Kgs.18.35|1Kgs 18:35]]; [[1Kgs.20.27|1Kgs 20:27]]; [[2Kgs.3.25|2Kgs 3:25]]; [[2Kgs.23.14|2Kgs 23:14]]; [[Isa.23.2|Isa 23:2]]; [[Job.3.15|Job 3:15]]; [[Job.22.18|Job 22:18]]; [[Jer.41.9|Jer 41:9]]; [[Ezek.3.3|Ezek 3:3]]; [[Ezek.7.19|Ezek 7:19]]; [[Ezek.9.7|Ezek 9:7]]; [[Ezek.10.2|Ezek 10:2]]; [[Ezek.24.4|Ezek 24:4]]; [[Nah.2.13|Nah 2:13]]; [[Hag.2.7|Hag 2:7]]; [[Ps.129.7|Ps 129:7]]; [[2Chr.16.14|2Chr 16:14]], etc. (indefinite subject); ***fill*** (cup) ***with drink*** for libation [[Isa.65.11|Isa 65:11]] figurative ***fill with spirit*** [[Exod.28.3|Exod 28:3]]; [[Exod.31.3|Exod 31:3]]; [[Exod.35.31|Exod 35:31]] compare v[[Exod.35.35|Exod 35:35]], [[Ps.107.9|Ps 107:9]]; [[Isa.33.5|Isa 33:5]]; [[Jer.15.17|Jer 15:17]] fill (with blood) [[2Kgs.21.16|2Kgs 21:16]] with abominations [[Ezra.9.11|Ezra 9:11]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ). 

**2.** special uses are: ***satisfy*** appetite [[Job.38.39|Job 38:39]]; [[Ps.17.14|Ps 17:14]]; [[Prov.6.30|Prov 6:30]]; [[Job.20.23|Job 20:23]]; [[Jer.51.14|Jer 51:14]] (figurative); ***take a handful of*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפּוֺ מִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Lev.9.17|Lev 9:17]] ***grasp*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדוֺ בְּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.24|2Kgs 9:24]], compare (of laying arrow on bow) figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקֶּשֶׁת בְּאֶפְרַיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Zech.9.13|Zech 9:13]] ***overflow*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַלֵּא עַלכָּֿלגְּֿד֯יֹתָיו‎</span> [[1Chr.12.16|1Chr 12:16]] (compare [[Josh.3.15|Josh 3:15]] **Qal**); ***give in full*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמַלְאוּם לַמֶּלֶךְ‎</span> [[1Sam.18.27|1Sam 18:27]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמַלְּאֵם‎</span> [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּא יַד פּ‎</span> figurative for ***institute to a priestly office, consecrate*** [[Exod.28.41|Exod 28:41]]; [[Exod.29.9|Exod 29:9]]; [[Exod.29.29|Exod 29:29]]; [[Exod.29.33|Exod 29:33]]; [[Exod.29.35|Exod 29:35]]; [[Lev.8.33|Lev 8:33]]; [[Lev.16.32|Lev 16:32]]; [[Lev.21.10|Lev 21:10]]; [[Num.3.3|Num 3:3]]; [[Judg.17.5|Judg 17:5]]; [[Judg.17.12|Judg 17:12]]; [[1Kgs.13.33|1Kgs 13:33]]; [[Ezek.43.26|Ezek 43:26]] (altar), [[1Chr.29.5|1Chr 29:5]]; [[2Chr.13.9|2Chr 13:9]]; [[2Chr.29.31|2Chr 29:31]] (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***umallu ‡atu***</u></abbr>, ***confer upon***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 409</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> ***wholly follow*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Num.14.24|Num 14:24]]; [[Num.32.11|Num 32:11]]; [[Num.32.12|Num 32:12]]; [[Deut.1.36|Deut 1:36]]; [[Josh.14.8|Josh 14:8]]; [[Josh.14.9|Josh 14:9]]; [[Josh.14.14|Josh 14:14]]; [[1Kgs.11.6|1Kgs 11:6]] ***fill in***, i.e. ***set*** precious stones [[Exod.28.17|Exod 28:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺ מִלֻּאַת אֶבֶן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>) compare [[Exod.31.5|Exod 31:5]]; [[Exod.35.33|Exod 35:33]]; [[Exod.39.10|Exod 39:10]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); etc. 

**3.** ***fulfil, accomplish, complete***, object week, year, day, [[Gen.29.27|Gen 29:27]]; [[Gen.29.28|Gen 29:28]]; [[Exod.23.26|Exod 23:26]]; [[Isa.65.20|Isa 65:20]]; [[Job.39.2|Job 39:2]]; [[2Chr.36.21|2Chr 36:21]]; [[Dan.9.2|Dan 9:2]] object word, promise, etc.; subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.15|1Kgs 8:15]]; [[1Kgs.8.24|1Kgs 8:24]]; [[2Chr.6.4|2Chr 6:4]]; [[2Chr.6.15|2Chr 6:15]]; [[Ps.20.5|Ps 20:5]]; [[Ps.20.6|Ps 20:6]] subject men [[1Kgs.2.27|1Kgs 2:27]]; [[Jer.44.25|Jer 44:25]]; [[2Chr.36.21|2Chr 36:21]]. 

**4.** ***confirm*** words [[1Kgs.1.14|1Kgs 1:14]]. **Pu\`al** ***Participle filled***, i.e. ***set*** with jewels <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמֻלָּאִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּתַּרְשִׁישׁ‎</span> [[Song.5.14|Song 5:14]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַי יִתְמַלָּא֑וּן‎</span> [[Job.16.10|Job 16:10]], ***mass themselves*** against me; perhaps denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹא‎</span> 

**2.**
